TopicTitle: Launching craft issues from the VAB (Loading screen, launching sequence, craft inputs, visuals).

Articles.Content: - Launching crafts from the VAB to launchpad 1 won't load the required sequences (e.g The loading screen, the actual craft on the launchpad, and the mechanic for launch countdown) and partially fixed only after restarting the application. As a result, the craft only appeared in the air above the launchpad after the relaunching of the application, given that no input for throttle and craft orientation was given. I believe this is a VAB to launch visual overlay issue.
